content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an oak_fence_gate, I first need to craft oak_planks, which requires 1 oak_log. Since I have 1 stripped_oak_wood, I will move it from slot 20 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft oak_planks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 17, "index": 18}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 63, "index": 42}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an oak_fence_gate, I need to place 1 stick, 1 oak_planks, and 1 stick in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the stick from slot 14 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_fence_gate

thought: Since the stick has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the oak_planks to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the oak_planks to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
